description:
The generated sample config [1]  does not include the notification_format option introduced in Mitaka.

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/sample_config.html
title: notification_format config option is not part of the sample config

comments.content:
The generated sample config [1]  does not include the notification_format option introduced in Mitaka.

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/sample_config.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content:

commit f8506618356816c3a01dff5dd99ba7c8a48f483c
Author: Balazs Gibizer <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Feb 18 17:35:01 2016 +0100

    config options: Centralize 'nova.rpc' options
    
    The single option in nova.rpc is moved to the central place.
    
    As this module contains a single option this patch also enhances
    the help text of it.
    
    Implements: bp centralize-config-options-newton
    Closes-bug: #1565753
    Change-Id: Ib6030c67b315a3b8d0d4854b4b6f1b969be6c00c

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
